name: Cheese is a Clout Chaser
description:
Cheese is a Clout Chaser

A game made for Global Game Jam 2020!

The on the role of Cheese, who's looking to post photos on his Nyangram account in order to gain likes and followers.

Use your mouse to move around and take photos. Check your phone to see how your account is doing!

Each cat has a different personality and will get bored at different times. Try to catch these moments for the most likes and new followers. 

Take a photo of your cats moving, and you might even lose followers for uploading blurry photos.

Credits

Art by: https://twitter.com/Heeji_Kim_
Programming by: https://twitter.com/mikosramek

Tech Used
  • Unity
  • Photoshop
